results.title: Metformin prevents brain injury after cardiopulmonary resuscitation by inhibiting the endoplasmic reticulum stress response and activating AMPK-mediated autophagy.
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: After 14 days of pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ underwent 9 minutes of @<m>DISEASE_Asphyxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001237 @@@asphyxia@@@ @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@/CPR.
